name: Ragdoll Fun 3
description: If you like ragdoll physics, then your in the right place. So, Ragdoll Fun 3 is a game about Ragdoll Physics. There are many things to do in the Ragdoll Fun 3 world. Jump off a mountain, get ran over by a car, Jump off a huge pile of stairs, spawn Ragdoll buddies, and a lot more. The game also has controller support if you want to play on a controller. So, download the game now! Also check out my other Ragdoll Fun games on my itch.io page.
